help.name: help
help.title: Waterfall Commands
help.select_category: Select a category from the dropdown below to view commands
help.support_server: Join our [support server](https://discord.gg/Dj5vS3mj7S) for help and updates related to the bot!

botstats.name: botstats
botstats.title: Waterfall Stats
botstats.footer: Version {{version}}{{canary}} ‎ • ‎ Made with {{emoji}} by DevSiege Studios

mail.name: mail
mail.expired_deleted: Some of your mail was expired and deleted.
mail.error_fetch: An error occurred while fetching your mail.

vote.name: vote
vote.not_voted: You haven't voted yet. Vote for the bot at: [Top.gg](https://top.gg/bot/1435231722714169435/vote)
vote.already_voted: You already voted recently. You can Vote again <t:{{time}}:R>.

suggestion.name: suggestion
suggestion.description: Suggest Commands or Functions for the Bot
suggestion.option_description: Describe in detail what you want to add/change
suggestion.title: {{type}} Suggestion
suggestion.preview_note: This is how your suggestion will be viewed to Developers.
suggestion.warning: WARNING: If we consider your request meaningless or inappropriate we may block you from using the Waterfall Bot. If you are sure that you want to submit this request, press the "Confirm" button below otherwise press the "Cancel button."
suggestion.success_description:
Your suggestion has been successfully delivered to DevSiege Studios.
We won't contact you about your suggestion unless you open a Support Ticket in our Discord Server.

report.name: report
report.description: Report a user or a bot issue/bug
report.option_type: What are you reporting? choose an option
report.title: {{type}} Report
report.warning:
WARNING: If we consider your report meaningless or inappropriate we can block you from using the Waterfall Bot.
 If you are sure about your report, please press the "Confirm" button below otherwise press the "Cancel" Button.
report.error_generic: We are sorry, an error occurred. Please report this to the developers

automod.name: automod
automod.advanced_description: Create advanced regex rules with custom options
automod.setup_desc: Choose a preset to quickly set up AutoMod rules for your server
automod.setup_override_notice: Existing setup rules will be replaced
automod.setup_link_combined: All enabled link protections combined into one rule

setup_rules.mention_spam_desc: Blocks messages with too many mentions
setup_rules.profanity_filter_desc: Blocks profanity and slurs using Discord's preset
setup_rules.link_filter_desc: Additional protection options for your server

automod.error_no_permission: You don't have permission to use this automod command.
automod.error_bot_no_permission: I need the Manage Server permission to manage AutoMod rules.
automod.error_max_rules: You have reached the maximum number of AutoMod rules ({{max}}).
automod.error_invalid_keywords: Please provide trigger keywords when creating a keyword rule.
automod.error_invalid_regex: Please provide a regex pattern when creating a regex rule.
automod.error_mention_exists: There is already a mention spam AutoMod rule in this server.
automod.error_no_log_channel: Please provide a log channel when creating an alert rule.
automod.error_max_keyword_rules: You can only have up to 6 keyword-based AutoMod rules. Delete some existing keyword rules to create new ones.
automod.block_message_default: Your message was blocked by the auto-moderation system.
automod.block_message_mentions: Your message contains too many mentions.
automod.error_log_channel_permissions: I don't have permission to view and/or send messages in {{channel}}. Alert actions will be disabled for this channel.
automod.mention_limit_desc: Maximum mentions allowed in a message
automod.advanced_timeout: Rule creation timed out after 10 minutes.
automod.advanced_success_note: The rule is now active and will filter messages based on your configuration.
automod.advanced_block_message: Your message was blocked by the advanced filter.
automod.advanced_cancel_title: Regex rule creation canceled or timed out.

keyword_options.number_variants_desc: Prevents character replacements using numbers (e.g. he11o)
keyword_options.symbol_variants_desc: Prevents character replacements using symbols (e.g. he!!o)
keyword_options.letter_variants_desc: Prevents character replacements using similar letters (e.g. heiio)
keyword_options.emoji_variants_desc: Prevents replacing characters with regional indicator emojis
keyword_options.letter_spam_desc: Prevents spamming the same character (e.g. hellllo)
keyword_options.extra_whitespace_desc: Prevents adding unnecessary spaces between characters
keyword_options.vowelless_variants_desc: Prevents removing vowels from words (may cause false positives)
keyword_options.character_deduplication_desc: Prevents repeated characters from being removed unto one (e.g. helo)
keyword_options.partial_matches_desc: Prevents adding text to the start or end of word

link_options.all_links_desc: Blocks all links with bypass protection
link_options.non_clickable_links_desc: Blocks links without https:// (may cause false positives)
link_options.inline_links_desc: Blocks disguised links with custom text
link_options.email_addresses_desc: Blocks email addresses from being shared

general_options.zalgo_warning_emoji: Some complex emojis will be blocked
general_options.zalgo_warning_accents: Accents allowed; may cause false negatives
general_options.filter_accents_desc: Blocks zalgo messages with accents (e.g. héllo)
general_options.subtext_desc: Blocks smaller text used for fake notices

automod.emoji_spam_desc: Maximum consecutive emojis allowed in a message
automod.regex_preview_desc: Here is the combined regex pattern that will be used for this rule:
automod.regex_too_long:
The generated regex pattern is too long ({{length}} characters).
Please reduce the number of protections or keywords.
You can try creating multiple rules with fewer keywords each.
automod.core_protections_desc: Select which core protections to enable

purge.name: purge
purge.error_permission: You do not have permission to use this command.
purge.error_bot_permission: I do not have ManageMessages permission in this channel.
purge.error_channel_permission: Purging more than 200 messages requires ManageChannels permission.
purge.error_invalid_amount: Please specify a valid number of messages (1 - 2,000).

logs.name: logs
logs.enable_success_desc: **{{type}}** logs will now be sent to {{channel}}.
logs.enable_exists: Log type **{{type}}** is already enabled in {{channel}}.
logs.list_desc: The current log configuration for this server
logs.list_empty: No log types are currently enabled.
logs.error_permission: You need the Manage Server permission to configure logs.
logs.error_bot_permission: I need permission to manage webhooks in that channel.
logs.error_bot_view_audit_log: I need the **View Audit Log** permission to track server events.
logs.list_error_config: An error occurred while fetching the log configuration.
logs.error_generic: An error occurred while updating the setting.

warn.name: warn
warn.clear_description: Clear all warnings for a user
warn.option_warn_id: The ID of the warning to remove
warn.option_action: Action to take at this threshold
warn.error_hierarchy: You cannot warn this user due to role hierarchy.
warn.error_admin_only: You need Administrator permissions to use this command.
warn.dm_next_action: If you receive **{{remaining}}** more warning(s), you will be **{{action}}**.
warn.dm_failed: Could not send DM to user.
warn.no_warns: This user has no active warnings.
warn.max_warns_reached: {{user}} already has the maximum of 7 warnings. Cannot add more warnings.
warn.no_warns_found: No warnings found for this user.
warn.warn_not_found: Warning not found. It may have already been removed.
warn.clear_confirm_desc:
Are you sure you want to clear all **{{count}}** warnings for **{{user}}**?
This action cannot be undone.

language.name: language
language.error_permission: You need the Manage Server permission to change the language.

wolfram.name: Wolfram Alpha Query
wolfram.error_generic: Sorry, I couldn't get an answer for that query.
wolfram.error_rate_limit: Wolfram|Alpha is busy. Please try again in a moment.
wolfram.error_api_limit: Wolfram|Alpha API limit reached. Please try again later.
wolfram.error_no_results: Wolfram|Alpha didn't understand that query. Try rephrasing.
wolfram.tutorial_text: Wolfram|Alpha works best with specific, direct questions. Try simplifying or rephrasing your query.

search.name: search
search.description: Search the web using various search engines
search.queries_description: Get links to all search engines
search.search_unavailable: {{engine}} Search is currently unavailable. Please try another engine.

color.name: color
color.description: Get detailed information about a color
color.invalid_format_msg: Please provide a valid hex color code.
color.verify_hex: Verify the hex code is valid (e.g., `FF0000` or `F00`)
color.ensure_exists: Ensure the color exists in the sRGB color space
color.error_404: The color API returned no data for that hex code.
color.error_api: The color API returned an error. Please try a different color.
color.error_not_responding: The color API is not responding. Please try again later.
color.error_not_found: Unable to connect to the color service.
color.error_unexpected: An unexpected error occurred while fetching color data.

minecraft.skin_description: Get the skin of a Minecraft player

dictionary.voice_channel_required: You must be in a voice channel to hear the pronunciation.

dictionary.already_in_channel: Bot is already in another voice channel in this server.
dictionary.audio_error: An error occurred while trying to play audio.
dictionary.only_command_user: Only the user who used the command can use this button.
dictionary.wait_cooldown: Please wait before using this again.
dictionary.fetch_member_error: Could not fetch your member info.
